lore: The Skull Devil can make flowers wither or slowly extinguish a person's life. But it does not always have such patience. Skull Devils need to reap at least one life every day or they become dust, but, as they are banned from all the cities in Rodia, they wait in areas where merchant caravans usually camp for the night. When a group of travelers arrives, the Devil comes out of the shadows and uses its scythe to cut off the head of any traveler who wanders off from the group.
menagerieDialog: You're the big boss here, right? You should share some of them resources with me, neh?
I prefer blades over magic. What's the fun in casting a spell when there's no blood to show in the aftermath of your effort?
The devil's in the details, neh?\n\n(Well, that was random.)
I have an idea! You should raise your kingdom's taxes. That way, you can steal from everyone with impunity.
I absolutely, positively did not steal this bag of coins from anyone.
name: Skull Devil
